front.title: A YANG Data Model for Flex Ethernet(FlexE)

abstract.t: Flex Ethernet(FlexE) implementation agreement have been published by OIF. FlexE provides a generic mechanism for supporting a variety of Ethernet MAC rates that may or may not correspond to any existing Ethernet PHY rate. This document describes a YANG data model for FlexE. It can be used to manage and control devices supporting FlexE functions.
